creator: Render World
descriptionHtml:
“Forging History: The Big Bang” is just the first puzzle chapter of a game saga that will cross epochs , starting before the Big Bang!
As you can tell, it revolves around recreating the conditions that triggered the BIG BANG and generate our UNIVERSE.
The theory may be complicated, but the game is fairly simple: you must reach a specific PRESSURE and a specific TEMPERATURE by exploding QUANTA particles. You can do it by collecting them with the STRINGS you are equipped with.

FEATURES:
- Collect Quanta and achieve the appropriate balance between temperature, pressure and energy to win the levels in this puzzle game and trigger the Big Bang!

- Unlock various types of Quanta until you meet the Anti-quanta

- Collect Quantum Energy and use it to unlock bonuses that will make you climb up the ranking!

- Embark on this epic saga winning levels and continuing through chapters or play in Free Mode, collecting points and climbing up the leaderboard!

- Easily sync the game across multiple devices and access all functionalities by connecting to the internet.

FIRST CHAPTER
This Chapter is just the beginning of a journey. We are going to take you through epochs and centuries, eons and eras, with new gaming ideas, challenges and different designs for each chapter we are going to release.
So, buckle up and get ready for a ride on our time machine!
Forging History: The Big Bang is free. We love to put out quality games for our fans therefore, if you wish, please feel free to support us. You can find us on many platforms: check out the "Support Us" section on the homepage of the game to know more.
Thanks to your precious support, we will have resources to create other levels for this brand-new game saga and continue our journey through History together.
Thank you in advance!
descriptionShort: Start your journey through the History of the Universe and Mankind!
